entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain in the evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
